participant_1.background:
My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle.
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
my father is a school teacher , he teaches middle school.

i play games at the arcade , still.

content.text: Hello! I am a big fan of Jimmy Fallon.
Hello! I am too. He is so funny.
I love watching him do his monologues. They always make me laugh.
Me too. He is really talented.
I also like watching his sketches. They are always so creative.
Me too. I love the ones he does with the Roots.
Those are my favorite. I love how they always play off of each other.
Me too. They are always so funny together.
Have you seen the one where they are trying to play Jenga?
No, I haven't. Is it funny?
It is! Fallon keeps knocking over the tower.
I will have to check it out.
You should. It is really funny.
No problem. I am always happy to talk about Jimmy Fallon
